definition[0]: to express your ideas or feelings in words
example[0]: Many people are unable to articulate the unhappiness they feel.
definition[1]: to pronounce what you are saying in a clear and careful way
example[1]: He was so drunk that he could barely articulate his words.
definition[2]: if something such as a bone in your body is articulated to another thing, it is joined to it in a way that allows movement
definition[3]: able to talk easily and effectively about things, especially difficult subjects
definition[4]: writing or speech that is articulate is very clear and easy to understand even if the subject is difficult
